name: Thessaloniki photography tour
description: An important part of Thessaloniki's heritage as a multi-ethnic economic, cultural and geographical center in the Balkan area, lies in exploring its streets, architecture and public life. A walk around Thessaloniki reveals historical traces from antiquity to the Byzantine era to the Ottoman period to its restructuring into a modern European city in the early 20th century. Walk its streets, and it is almost as if the city narrates its story by itself.
